summary: Requiem 1.8 patch for Elemental Arrows by Fuma
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8 patch for Elemental Arrows by Fuma

Damage have been adjusted to match Requiem's values. Elven and Dwarven based arrows are tagged as 15% armor piercing ammo. Unlevel leveled list applied.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - ElementalArrows.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - ElementalArrows.esp after Requiem and ElementalArrows and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
ElementalArrows.esp
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - ElementalArrows.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp

[u]Wrye Bash Users:[/u]
Change the Bash Tags on Requiem - ElementalArrows.esp from "Automatic" to "Delev" and "Relev"
Otherwise, Wrye Bash will add Elemental Arrows's Leveled List into the Bashed Patch.

[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49983/?]Elemental Arrows[/url]: Fuma
author: spikyfishy
